content.text:
# List of LGBTQ social networking services

There are a variety of LGBT social networking services. Grindr is the largest and best-known gay mobile app, and was one of the first when it launched in March 2009.
* Adam4Adam
* Atraf
* Blued
* Delta App
* dudesnude
* Fridae
* Gabile.com
* Gaydar
* Gays.com
* GaySurfers.net
* Grindr
* GuySpy
* Her
* Hornet
* Jack'd
* Manhunt
* Recon
* Romeo
* Scruff
* Sniffies
* Squirt.org
* Taimi
* UNIQ.ME
Defunct

* Compatible Partners
* DBNA
* Gay.com
* Gingerbeer
* Manjam.com
* OUTeverywhere
* Trevvy
